titlestmt.titleproper: Finding aid to the Jan Roby collection of photographs of lesbian feminist activists SSC.MS.00378

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2019-05-15 15:19:49 -0400.

change.item: This record was migrated from InMagic DB Textworks to ArchivesSpace.
Updated legacy finding aid and published.

did.unittitle: Jan Roby collection of photographs of lesbian feminist activists
did.abstract: Jan Roby collection of photographs of lesbian feminist activists consists of 70 photographs of lesbian feminist activists: Jan Roby, Jill Johnston, Alida Walsh, Sidney Abbott, Dianne Brenner, Phyllis Birkby, and others.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Closed pending a deed of gift.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Jan Roby collection of photographs of lesbian feminist activists, Sophia Smith Collection, SSC-MS-00378, Smith College Special Collections, Northampton, Massachusetts.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Materials
relatedmaterial.p: Phyllis Birkby Papers; Kate Millett Papers; Sydney Abbott Papers; Diana Davies Papers

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of 70 photographs of lesbian feminist activists: Jan Roby, Jill Johnston, Alida Walsh, Sidney Abbott, Dianne Brenner, Phyllis Birkby, and others.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Materials in this collection may be governed by copyright. For reproductions of materials that are governed by fair use as defined under U. S. Copyright Law, no permission to cite or publish is required. Researchers are responsible for determining who may hold materials' copyrights and obtaining approval from them. Researchers do not need anything further from Smith College Special Collections to move forward with their use.

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: The Jan Roby collection of photographs of lesbian feminist activists consists of 70 photographs of lesbian feminist activists.
